text:
Alexey Ivanovich Sorokin () (28 March 1922 – 4 March 2020) was a Soviet Admiral of the Fleet. He was a member of the Congress of People's Deputies of the Soviet Union. He was a political officer and studied at the Lenin Military-Political Academy between 1948 and 1952.
Sorokin died on 4 March 2020 in Moscow at the age of 97.

annotations.surface_form: Congress of People's Deputies of the Soviet Union
